post:
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/v_dot_ps)

Hello,

We are happy to announce our VPS product launches today!

## Why choose [V.PS](https://v.ps/)?

- [V.PS](https://v.ps/) is part of [xTom](https://xtom.com/), an affordable colocation and IP transit provider since 2012.
- We own all enterprise hardware from Dell, HP & Samsung, network and IP space.
- In-house networking engineer and local staff in datacenter.
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection w/ Premium Tier 1 Upstreams.
- 14-day money back guarantee

## Our KVM VPS features:

- Dual E5v3/v4 Processors
- Enterprise SSDs in Hardware RAID-10
- KVM Virtualization on Proxmox VE
- BGP Sessions, DE-CIX DUS and LocIX Ports Available (Düsseldorf and Frankfurt)
- Reverse DNS (PTR) configuration on client area

## KVM VPS Plans

#### Starter

```
- 1GB RAM
- 2x vCPU
- 20GB SSD space
- 1TB transfer
- 1Gbps uplink
- 1x IPv4
- 1x IPv6
- KVM/Proxmox
- €4.76/month with 20% Off Coupon Code LES20OFF
```

Order link

AMS https://vps.hosting/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=91
DUS https://vps.hosting/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=104

## Payment Method:

Paypal, all major Credit Cards, SEPA and Bank Transfer.

For some countries, we support specific local payment methods like Alipay, Bancontact, EPS, Giropay, iDEAL, Multibanco, Sofort and Przelewy24.
